TopicTitle: JellyCubes Advanced Weapons R&D - Weapons and Other Miscellanea

Articles.Content:
How do I use the Modular Missile Pack? I can use the railgun , but not the missiles....

And btw , can you make a drastically scaled up version?

People want to make a Magnetic Acclerator Cannon.....

Links here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12932-Request-Orbital-MAC-Cannon?p=236108#post236108

You are able to build your own missle.

You are given 2 nose cones, 1 body (decoupler) and 1 end booster.

Attach the 3 given fins any way you find suitable.

To launch make sure the booster is on the decoupler stage.
Needs Self Destruct Nuke Parts, To Torture Dem Kerbals

Remote Tech?

Remote Tech?

Yes, I used cfg edited modular missile nosecone (as RC controller and antenna) SRB changed to LFE and rescaled fuel tank and .5m MechJeb.
awesome gudied missiles eh thats nice ive thinking of a space railgun i havent tested it :3 ill try it out if the railgun can shoot in space

Recoil is little extreme and you never have enough ammo (4 or 8 shots per barrel) but firepower of that thing is awesome - one or two shots is enough to take out a large station.

P.S. I edited cfg of the C7 wing adapter (Impact Tolerance = 1000) and this thing became the armor plate.

Edited August 25, 2012 by KAPbl4
HOLAY i shot the railgun in space it destoryed a space base/mun base and i tested the missles it had epicness writed all over it
I'd really like a scaled-down "pistol" version of the railgun for my smaller crafts. It's hard to lug all that into orbit just to take out a deserted space station!

Hah, I use quad turret with x3 scaled railguns as the main gun for my battleship - this is truly devastating weapon. Orbital bombardment of the Mun Base from 500 km circular orbit (with switching to the shell after firing) looks nice. )

If you want the railgun of the different size - just add "RescaleFactor = " ("3" in my case) to the CFG of the railgun and the shell (In the "// --- asset parameters ---" block)

Edited August 28, 2012 by KAPbl4

I only wish there was a reticule for the railgun.

i dont have the link off hand, but theres a mod on the forum for a laser, the laser has a mode where it works as a laser pointer (for lining up shots manually) you can mount one on the cannon, line it down the barrel, and youll have atleast a way of aiming the cannon.
How do you fire the railgun?
put the rounds into the rail gun and shoot did that help

Dammit wolfpaw, you're not helping.

Put the rounds in the railgun, they will appear as decouplers. Put them in any stage you want and when you stage they will fire.

Hi,

so i not long got the missile and the barrel gun, but when ever i make a space plane and put a missile on with a decoupler, it launches the missile before i even take off in a heli. anyideas??

and for the barrel gun i dont know where to get any ammo...

i have the full game and tried making a heli / apache after i saw someone make a apache replica....

after i have launched my missiles (before i have taken off) now when ever i take off it will do back summersaults whilst turning to the right.

any answers will be very helpful
